nodes.text: The PlayStation 3 or PS3 is the third video game console made by Sony, following the PlayStation and PlayStation 2. Numerous early editions of the Playstation 3 were backwards-compatible, allowing gamers to play PlayStation 1 and Playstation 2 games.
The PlayStation 3 edition of Soulcalibur IV has Darth Vader and Starkiller as playable characters with Yoda as downloadable content.
PlayStation Network is Sony's online gaming and content delivery system for the PlayStation 3.
